description: yeehaa is an ecosystem architect with a PhD in Philosophy, blending academia and tech expertise. As an entrepreneur, he founded Offcourse and created the Superconnectors event format. Based in Taipei, yeehaa focuses on transforming education, knowledge sharing, and fostering inclusive internet communities. His work spans various domains, including ecosystem architecture, decentralization, and regenerative design. yeehaa's blog posts and curated courses reflect his diverse interests, covering topics like internet fragmentation, waste economy, biomimicry, and sustainable collaboration. He advocates for value pluralism and the importance of "voting with your feet" in both digital and physical ecosystems.
blurb: yeehaa: Ecosystem architect, philosopher, and tech innovator bridging academia and entrepreneurship. Advocates for inclusive internet, regenerative design, and value-driven communities. Explores decentralization, sustainability, and knowledge sharing through diverse writings and courses.
